title: Tajikistan mobilizes 20,000 reservists to bolster border with Afghanistan | TheHill
content:
1. Tajikistan mobilizes 20,000 reservists to bolster border with Afghanistan | TheHill  The Hill
  2. More than 1,000 Afghan soldiers flee into Tajikistan as Taliban extends control, Tajik officials say  The Washington Post
  3. Taliban Find New Revenues as They Seize Afghanistan’s U.S.-Built Border Gateway  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Over 1,000 Afghan troops facing advancing Taliban forces retreated and fled the country  Business Insider
  5. Over 1000 Afghan troops flee Taliban into Tajikistan • FRANCE 24 English  FRANCE 24 English
